name: Pile - Stack the Tower Game
description:
Pile- Stack the Tower Game

Make pile of tiles to the sky with epic Stack the Tower Game of 2017!

Are you ready to construct your own skyscraper by pile the tiles in the stack the tower game? Then rush to the play store and free install the pile- Stack the Tower Game and drop stacks to build the endless buildings. Try to drop blocks in balanced line to create a high tower in the city. Keep in mind that don’t let the blocks fall down from the stack otherwise, you will lose the game. Multiple colors of stack as you progress in the pile-Stack the Tower game. Challenge yourself and see how many blocks can you drop to create the highest tower.
